comments:
I have started using the pattern of typing in a method name and then using quick
fix to create that method.  However, recently I have been experiencing problems
with this.  
The only change that seems relevant is that I recently allowed Eclipse to update
itself by installing the Cheetah plugin.  Uninstalling Cheetah makes this
problem go away.

When I try to apply the quick fix "create method for...", I get the following
stack trace:
